text: Mónica Eliana Jiménez de la Jara (December 25, 1940 - August 25, 2020) was a Chilean Christian Democrat politician. She was born in Santiago de Chile. From 2008 to 2010, she was Minister of Education during the Michelle Bachelet presidency. Between 2016 and 2018, she was the Chilean Ambassador to Israel. Jiménez died from cancer in Santiago on August 25, 2020 at the age of 79.Fallece exministra de Educación Mónica Jiménez producto de un cáncer ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Chile Category:Ambassadors to Israel Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: Mónica Jiménez
